content: >**get 20 % off when you buy 3 patterns no coupon needed** this extra long scarf measures 100 inches long and 5 5 inches wide the pattern uses the bean stitch to create a beautifully puffy and textured look a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel crochet bean stitch scarf pattern 1 what comes in the pdf all pattern info on this page plus the following linked timestamps row by row for the video tutorial for easy access > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out and get other free patterns from the pattern library materials needed for this scarf 725 yards of a #4 medium weight yarn yarn used loops & threads facets yarn 3 skeins in the color flame 5 00 mm h crochet hook & 6 00 j mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional the foundation chain is worked using the 6 00 mm crochet hook and then the rest of the pattern uses the 5 00 mm crochet hook 1 https //youtu be/l7nblfypdks 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
